member.name: F:AutoCount.Report.AutoCountReportStringId.GetSingleValueSyntax
member.summary:
The syntax of GetSingleValue is @GetSingleValue:TableName:ColumnName:SQL Where Clause:zero or more parameters separated by colon.

For example: @GetSingleValue:Debtor:EmailAddress:AccNo=?:DebtorCode

The above example will query the Debtor table for EmailAddress column for AccNo equals to variable DebtorCode in this report.

member.name: F:AutoCount.Report.AutoCountReportStringId.ExecuteScalarSyntax
member.summary:
The syntax of ExecuteScalar is @ExecuteScalar:SQL Statement:FormatType or FormatString:SQL Where Clause:zero or more parameters separated by colon.

For example: @ExecuteScalar:SELECT EmailAddress FROM Debtor WHERE AccNo=?::DebtorCode

The above example will query the Debtor table for EmailAddress column for AccNo equals to variable DebtorCode in this report.

member.summary: Adds a control into the specified LayoutControl. The control and LayoutControlItem will be named using the following convention: Control: edt_ + (name value) LayoutControlItem: lyt_ + (name value) To access the objects after addition, just search via the name following the convention above. By default the LayoutControlItem has the padding set to 0
member.param: The Control in which to add into the LayoutControl
Unique name for both control and LayoutControlItem
The text to be shown in the Text property of the LayoutControlItem
Hide the newly created LayoutControlItem in the Customization form. Default is false
Create a new group to add to the Layout Control. Default is false
The group name to use when generating a new LayoutControlGroup. Default is the Master Information group name. If createNewGroup is set to true, this value must be change to a unique name
The group caption to use when generating a new LayoutControlGroup. Default is the Master Information caption. If createNewGroup is set to true, this value must be change
